name: dream-eater
flavor_text: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.
effect_text_extend: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon.  Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect_text_simple: Only works on sleeping Pokémon.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
